name: First Survival Game
description:
Hello !

This is my first real game I have devloped myself on Unity.

The goal is simple : you're dropped on an apocalyptic city, and you must find a cure against zombies. After finding it, you will have to wait the helicopter to evacuate the place, but becerful to the zombie horde !

_______________________________________________________________________________

Things you have to know play :

- Classic buttons to move, jump and shoot : Z - Q - S - D - space - Left click

- Press Shift to speed

- You can use 3 guns : Rifle (1), Pistol (2), Knife (3)

- During the mission, when you have to wait to the helicopter, you actually need to kill a certain number of zombies

- You can reload only when your current magazine has no bullets anymore

- When one of your gun has no magazines, lights will appear in the environment and you will be able to pick up ammos.

Same when your health is <=60

- Reload animation of the pistol is sometimes bugged (lol), just switch gun

_______________________________________________________________________________

Available in the Assert Store of Unity

Destroyed City : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/destroyed-city-free...

Rain Effects : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/unity-particle-pack...

Ennemis & boss from https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Musics : 

The Last of Us 2 : Desolation

Left 4 Dead 2 : Main menu & Tank theme

_______________________________________________________________________________

That's it ! Enjoy and don't hesitate to give me feedbacks ! It will help me a lot to improve the futur games !

Thanks !
